entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
